description: People say my best qualities are I'm very kind and love to help people, friends with anyone!! I like travel, especially road trips, exploring different areas and having fun. Also I enjoy learning about many cultures and meeting people. I lived in Tokyo for nearly 2 years and taught English to little kids part time, heaps of fun! Please say hi and hopefully we can chat and please feel free to ask me anything you wish!
intent: Fun, Friendship, Romance, Serious Relationship, Marriage
